description: Explore the interoperability between Arbitrum and Ethereum and its impact on the scalability of decentralized applications. Discover how Arbitrum enhances Ethereum's capabilities without compromising its security and decentralization.
keywords: Arbitrum, Ethereum, interoperability, scalability, blockchain, decentralized applications, dApps, user experience, Ethereum security, blockchain adoption
title: Exploring Arbitrum and Ethereum's Interoperability
